description: Dispatched when an entity is instantiated during world initialization or runtime.

entityId.description: The ID of the instantiated entity.

instanceId.description: The unique instance ID of the entity, if applicable.

definitionId.description: The ID of the entity definition used for instantiation.

worldName.description: The name of the world where the entity was instantiated.

reason.description: The reason for instantiation (e.g., 'Initial World Load (Batch)').
